name: RocketPy
description:
Carefully navigate your 1x1 hitbox ROCKET around the ever-increasing SATELLITES. The longer you last, the higher you rank. Collect coins early to boost your score.

I wanted to compete with Goodgis. The elf is not impressed as it took me until now to release the game.
Controls:

  • Arrow keys / WASD
  • Enter / Return
  • Space bar
  • Escape
  • M / mutes in-game music

The score is determined by the obstacles and the time elapsed. Share your highest rank and score. Note: Some upper ranks may be unattainable.

Ranks:

  • Nooblet
  • Noob
  • Newbie
  • Novice
  • Neophyte
  • Dabbler
  • Initiate
  • Apprentice
  • Pupil
  • Learner
  • Practitioner
  • Semi-Pro
  • Adept
  • Expert
  • Pro
  • Wizard
  • Master
  • Scholar
  • Grandmaster
  • Legend
  • Chad
  • Millionaire

Play on Linux/Mac🐧🍎
https://gitlab.com/scope-crepe/rocketpy
